name: Zero Possession Prototype
description:
Sedna Games Brand New Project!!!

Sedna Games is finally breaking its silence with its brand new project, ZERO POSSESSION! An idea that's been in the making since the summer of 2020 Sedna Games has finally begun pre-production on Zero Possession! Zero Possession is an FPS platformer that finds the player completing challenging platforming and combat! Taking inspiration from titles such as Mirror's Edge, Ghostrunner, Superhot & more.

Look forward to updates within the next few months on this project!

Game Controls

WASD to Move

Spacebar to Jump/Double Jump

CTRL to Slide

Shift to Dash

Left Click - Melee

Right Click - Shoot Gun

Source Code: https://github.com/Sedna-Games/Zero-Possession-Prototype

Soundtrack (tracks 1 & 2): https://cartermenary.bandcamp.com/album/cgx-game-jam-original-soundtracks

Credits

Hamraj Rai - Producer, Level Design, Environment Art

Carter Menary - Music, Sound Design

Anthony Smiderle - Programming

Daniel Hong - Programming

Jeremy Kan - Sword Model
